website_summaries.verdict: Versatile portable speaker that runs from battery and can support 2 audio sources simultaneously.
pros: Provides several different colors of cases, so you can find a the perfect match for your area
Speaker is completely waterproof, so it's great around the pool or even in rainy weather
Daisy-chain up to 100 speakers for a larger coverage area
Features built-in Bluetooth connectivity and can connect to 2 devices at the same time
cons: Only gives you 12 hours of battery life, which is disappointing at this price point

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound - surprising bass coming from this little speaker. Edit: 7 months later, JBL flip 4 doesn't hold a charge for more than 5 hours. I did drop it just once -- maybe that has something to do with it - idk. That audio quality is still there, though. Edit 2: 1 Year. Wont charge at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Castor Gordon

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL battery
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Great appearance. Great packaging. HOWEVER, the battery couldn't be any worse. Co-workers own the Flip2 and Flip3, and all of is have experienced the same. After only a few uses the battery no longer holds a charge and ois nearly impossible to get a full charge. If JBL can't get this issue fixed and stand behind their product, I think you should look elsewhere for a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gager

customer_reviews.title: The speaker stoped working after a week and charges but doesnt turn on.this was a  christmas gift and really dissapointed me.
customer_reviews.text: Really want to Return this speaker no way to contact seller on this defective speaker need to return
customer_reviews.author: Velma Reep

customer_reviews.title: It sounded great when working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker August 4th of 2017. It sounded great when working, but a week ago it stopped taking a charge. I have tried all kinds of things, and tested all the possible USB chargers to make sure that it was not the chargers. The unit just does not charge at all, I have tried overnight charging, and 2 days worth or USB, and a different cable, but no go. My next step is to see if JBL will honor some kind of warranty. Booo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JBL does it again
customer_reviews.text: I am so fascinated how extremely great this speaker is for only a whopping 100$ dollars. I would buy this speaker for 300$. An absolute steal! Pros: -Great mid range and hi range -EXTREMELY LOUD!! -Waterproof ip7 -Easy to clean with running water -Amazing design -Very long battery life -Extreme compatibility Cons: -heavy bass will make the speaker quieter and makes a little bit of distortion (for rap music) but that is to be expected with a speaker of this size. Well done JBL
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this product two stars instead of one star is because when it worked, it had excellent sound. HOWEVER, after a year of minimal use, it will not accept a charge anymore. It has not been dropped or abused in any way. I would expect a speaker that cost $100 or so to last MUCH longer. Very disappointed. Will not be buying a JBL product again.
customer_reviews.author: Marti G. Detrick

customer_reviews.title: 4 Hour Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Its really loud and gets the job done. Claims to have a 12 hour battery life, but unfortunately I cant get it to last for more than 4. Whether it is turned up all the way or not. Update: 3 months later it can barely even hold a 3 hour charge. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. Horrible battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, if you are reading the reviews, you know by now that the battery life is horrible. And here is another review about it. The sound is amazing. When you first start using it, you are really impressed by everything about the Flip 4. After 1 year using it, battery won't charge at all. I started using it connected to the power. And now, not even that will work. For a brand like JBL, it seems to me that they don't care about it. So many people with the same problem, and I couldn't find any answer from JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Design

customer_reviews.title: Dead in Six Months
customer_reviews.text: This speaker died six months after purchase. It was used a limited amount of time and was never exposed to water. It just stopped working. The enclosed documentation is printed in hundreds of languages, but no where can I locate warranty information. A most unsatisfactory buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Battery life👎
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this speaker a couple months ago but waited to write my review to REALLY see the quality of this product. I’m rating the 2 star simply for the quality of sound....it’s GOOD for in the House or office. Not so good outdoors if u want volume. The reason for my bad rating is the battery life. I’ve charged this product for plenty of time and yet it’ll still die out w/in an hour or LESS!! There r even times I have it on the charger charging while in use and it’ll STILL DIE🤦🏻‍♀️ Very disappointed because I had the older version of this product b4 upgrading to this one and it Performed much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ed_latu

customer_reviews.title: Love JBL, Hate this (defective) speaker
customer_reviews.text: I think I just got a defective one because most of the reviews rave over the sound quality. Mine just constantly farts (no smell) and sounds like its completely blown but I haven't even turned the volume up or listened to any heavy metal (yet)! They must have not given the sweat shop kids their daily peanuts and bread crust because this one is just brutal to listen to. I'm surprised it didn't come with a hidden note that said "help me". This is all i can guess because usually JBL does a great job. Watch my video for more info.
customer_reviews.author: sean wallis

customer_reviews.title: Treble Too Harsh at Medium to High Volumes
customer_reviews.text: I listen to Jazz that has deep base and high horns. I find that when I turned the volume up loud enough to hear the bass, the horns sound harsh. When I turn the volume down to make the horns listenable, the bass goes away. There is a sweet spot in which the bass and treble sound ok, but too quiet to be enjoyable to me. Plus, the speaker is designed not to roll backward, but there is nothing preventing the speaker from rolling forward. Ergo, when I put the Flip 4 on the dashboard of my car, the Flip 4 rolls off the dash when I accelerate. Had to send it back..
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE WARRANTY !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just quit working for NO Reason......Checked online ...many complaints of same disorder. If you get one...buy Extended Warranty !!! Sounded Incredible...was VERY Happy ...then JUST QUIT WORKING
customer_reviews.author: CRUISER DON

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't charge anymore, it was good for a couple months after I bought it. I used to play music in my room when I was on my a cruise. Then didn't use it again for a while till today (july 1st). It died and now it's not chargin at all, I know the charger and cord work because I charge my headphones from it. It's even the cord that came with the speaker. NOT happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Mena

customer_reviews.title: JBL switching to PartyBoost  buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker but unfortunately JBL is switching away from connect+ (which this and most others have from JBL) to "Party boost" for connecting more than one speaker around the house or yard at the same time. JBL is making ALL their speakers obsolete with pairing to newer speakers. The flip 5 is only the current model that has jumped to part boost so far. The software is not fwd or backwards compatible so either stick with the older models or buy the newest ones..which haven't all come out yet. Really a let down. Terrible decision to not make them all talk together.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound. Dismal Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I've experienced the sound of a flip 3 and for the life of me, I can't figure out why the 4 would lack so much bass. Not my biggest gripe. Bluetooth was terrible. I had to re-pair it with every device I used it on, every. single.time.. Bluetooth is awesome when it works but it is one of the most finicky wireless standards out there. Sadly my experience sucked. Probably a bad chip. Crappy bluetooth sealed the deal, though as I was already unhappy with the bass response. I feel they may have cut some corners in the design. Had to return, not interested in another. I appreciate the other reviews offering some competing products.
customer_reviews.author: Dadn8r

customer_reviews.title: It's great if you like a little music with your hissing noise.
customer_reviews.text: It feels like it's built well and it looks great...and then I turned it on and heard the God-awful hissing. Even with no sound playing and no devices connected the hissing echo'd through my office. Got a replacement and this one hisses when any sound is playing. Tested via AUX cable and bluetooth. Even the power up and power off sounds produce the hissing noise with no devices or charging cable connected. Sending the replacement back for a refund and moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY STOPPED working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk... it worked GREAT when it actually worked. Then 3 months into very light use, and one day it just wouldn’t charge, turn on, or respond to any button combination. It’s turned into an expensive anchor.
customer_reviews.author: PinkBee

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for both indoor and outdoor use. I use it as a speaker for my projector, for music streaming in the apartment, for beach entertainment, and backyard bbqs. I would give it 5 stars, but Ive had some issues with the usb charging port on the speaker. The last speaker I had, the charging port malfunctioned. No bends, not breaks, just stopped charging. Apparently other people had some issues with this as well. Ive learned to be much more careful when plugging in, but is still something I worry about.
customer_reviews.author: WV

customer_reviews.title: The Speaker Packs A Punch
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bluetooth speakers that I've ever heard. It's light weight but feels durable and high quality. The bluetooth range is great. i had my phone in my phone and walked in my garage, upstairs, and left the speaker outside and it was still playing. I was really shocked by that. If there are any cons, I have yet to notice it. the bass is superb as well. That's a big talking point for this speaker and it does not disappoint. The sound is really loud, that you would think you might get a noise complaint if sitting on your balcony. I'm very pleased with this speaker and it did not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with JBL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday and she absolutely loves it. I already had the larger JBL myself so i knew they made quality speakers, but this one is just great. Much more portable than mine since it is smaller, but still has outstanding sound. And the battery seems to last forever. She’ll go days without charging it, even though she uses it almost every day. Quite frankly, I don’t think that I will ever buy another portable, Bluetooth speaker, unless it’s a JBL speaker. I have two now and both are great. Don’t look at other brands, just get a JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Neil K.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great durability
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great durability, and I would definitely purchase one as a gift. I've had friends remark about the sound quality, being surprised it was coming from such a little thing. I've not tested the waterproofness, nor do I care to. It's fine right where it is on the dry countertop away from water sources. UPDATE: I had to bump it down from 5 stars because it's no longer holding a charge and every now and then it'll fritz out and make a ton of static noise. I've treated it very carefully and I never max out the volume or yank the charge cable out. I certainly expected this speaker to last more than a year, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Android Elise

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing was horrible. I cant believe how many positive reviews there are. I bought it to play my portable synthesizers through while kicking back on the couch or possibly busking. It couldn't handle any bass. I wasn't overloading it, I was playing at a comfortable level for watching TV while fiddling around on my synths. The bass was basically an annoying 'doink'. I bought a Mackie Home for $15 more and it sounds great. Yeah, this weighs about the same as a Big Mac, but at the cost of fidelity.... I'd go for the the Prime Rib.
customer_reviews.author: muzixplorer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the $99 Bose I returned
customer_reviews.text: Really love my JBL speaker had so many problems with the $99 Bose waterproof speaker I got this one and really enjoy the sound easy Bluethooth connection, I wish the battery life was a little longer. The only other thing I would change is the power connection, those tiny connecters seem easily to bend or not fit very well. I would like to have seen the USB type since I have more than my fair share of those laying around. Time will tell but have had the JBL more than a month and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CSee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, laggy Bluetooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of this speaker is amazing, so is the weight of carrying it around. Being waterproof truly helps as well, as I can use it while taking showers. The sound quality compares to Bose SoundLink (which my roommate has) except for may be for the bass, but nothing too. However, where is lags is the Bluetooth connectivity. It works most of the time perfectly with my phone, but goes haywire when I connect with my windows laptop.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Super sound ,JBL quality, must hang 🤔
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this JBL speaker 5 stars if the was a way to out it down on a surface. But there is not. Theres a photo or 2 of it sitting on a surface but it is not clear that there is no part of the product meant to lay on a surface. so its meant to hang or be held on your wrist I suppose. I was bummed I had to send it back it wasn't affordable way to have z fantastic quality portable compact speaker for under 100. But its has th hat ond weird flaw which might be why its sold for less than 100.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY LOVESamazon

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality sound. What I don't like is that turning it on and off, it makes a loud sound. You cannot pair two bluetooth device to this when each of them within range of the speaker. I did (my computer and my phone), and it shuts off my itself every 10 minutes or so. Once I unpaired from my computer, it works fine. Or the computer is not within range (like when I take it to work and pair with my phone only), then it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tu V. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair with beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try something a little different in a bluetooth speaker. I'm a big Bose fan but my Bose color is a few years old and pretty banged up. The battery isn't holding a charge very long anymore so I decided a new speaker was in my future. I chose the JBL Flip 4 and I'm very pleased with my purchase. It pairs easily to my phone ( iPhone 8 ) and the battery life is fantastic. The sound is just as good if not a touch better than the Color. It is not meant to fill the room but it is very enjoyable to listen to. I'm very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: The best in category
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is not the smallest but the sound is good. The sound is not as clear as in a good stereo system but I did not expect it from a small single speaker. Nevertheless, the sound is good. It is warm and soft. I preferred it over UE that sounded more spacial and background. The base is not as low as I would like. It is easy to join 2 speakers into a stereo. I think that at the moment this speaker is the best portable bluetooth speaker. Maybe Sonos is better but they start at $400.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sound and quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail yesterday and I LOVE it! I purchased the speaker in teal. It is a shade or two darker than the picture but it’s still a pretty color. I love the way the buttons on the speaker press and the sound quality is amazing. Like the video attached, I love the way the speakers move with the bass. So far, so good ! It’s smaller than what I imagined and I love it because it makes it more portable. Such a cute and stylish speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Han

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can pair it with my daughters and ...
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has outstanding sound quality. And battery life too. Love that I can pair it with my daughters and get even more powerful sound. I bought a very similar 'Monster' speaker from Sam's and tested it out....and there was no comparison with the JBL. The quality of the JBL allows you to hear dynamic layers of the music. Other speakers sound "flat" in contrast. The JBL also sounds loud outside....which is difficult for these little speakers with no walls to reverberate soundwaves off of. The JBL handles it like a champ! If you are on the fence about this....just get it. You won't find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: AntiSocial Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker - Placement is important for good sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the form factor and sound in most situations. Some places it sounds great others it sounds marginal. Placement is important for good sound. I bring this to hotel rooms when I travel and it works great in that situation. In a very open outdoor space it is a little less full sounding. The battery lasts for several hours when it is working properly. I purchased one a few months before this one and wanted another because I like it so much. Now just after one year (the warranty period) it shuts down at random and has static sounds when playing. JBL offered to send a replacement if this one is really defective! Let's see how this works out.
customer_reviews.author: John V

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a relatively cheap option for a quality bt speaker to use while golfing and lounging outside, and I think the flip4 is the sweet spot. 20 and 30 dollar products just dont have the same functionality and rich sound you get with this speaker. It's extremely easy to use; I was listening to music within a couple minutes of opening the box. Came with 3/5 bars of battery power. Only fault I can really point to: even though it appears to be like a cylindrical room filling speaker, the audio is very 'directional' in that you'll notice a significant change in clarity when listening off-center or away from the JBL symbol.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Very strong case
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After 2 months of normal use and enjoyment the volume controls stopped working. I would say minimal use at best for the product. Bluetooth won't connect to phone any longer now either. I would not recommend this product to anyone. UPDATE ON RETURN: I was finally able to acquire a return label from AMAZON "not" JBL, JBL was of no use to me as far as returning defective product after speaking to them on the phone. I paid $74 for speaker and am getting a $59 credit for my troubles. Buyers beware, I guess I'm lucky to get anything back at all "MERICA"
customer_reviews.author: Silent Assasin

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker with great color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the teal version for my wife as a mother's day gift because it's her favorite color and this speaker had generally favorable reviews. A lot of other portable speakers have unattractive designs or color options, but this hits the mark. Pairing via bluetooth was easy on an iPhone XR and Android phone. I have not tested the app, but it's not needed unless you want more advanced options or pairing multiple speakers. Speaking of, this speaker has the ability to connect to other JBL speakers to create a sort of surround sound environment. I'd highly recommend this speaker to anyone looking for one. Charges via micro usb and holds a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: flazer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out how to turn this unit On at first. Lousey instructions! I went on line and watched a Video and realized I just wasn't pushing down hard enough on the On button. At first the Unit seemed to have too much Base and I was able to adjust the sound quality via my LG phone using the Equalizer graph and was amazed to see how well the speakers preformed over the entire range of music and different types of songs. The quality was superb!!! I'm very happy with the JBL Flip 4 and would recommend it to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Don 954

customer_reviews.title: Broke when it fell a foot or two
customer_reviews.text: Today it fell off a small chair and kept working fine until I went to charge it. No lights, no power, etc. Couldn't get it to do anything. I wound up opening it up to see if there was something obviously wrong and didn't see anything. I disconnected and connected some of the wires inside and that didn't do anything either. This is the first time I've dropped it, and it only fell a foot or two. I've taken very good care of it and never really did anything crazy with it. Turns out it's not very rugged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: After an hour still didn't work- Returned for money back.
customer_reviews.text: Never got it to play. The printed instructions are a joke, leaving out many crucial steps. Their phone tech support was somewhere far, far away with terrible audio connection and someone with little English language ability. Also sounded like she knew absolutely nothing about the device. Her first day? So, didn't want to spend another hour trying to get this working. Will find a better unit. This is not the JBL that I grew up with. No idea of the sound quality or battery life.
customer_reviews.author: RGMaier

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and range
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the shower to listen to music while getting ready for work. Pairing the speaker to my phone was extremely easy. Previous speakers I had lacked range. I can actually walk around my house with phone in pocket and still be connected to the speaker. I have used it about a week, only charging once for the initial charge. Battery indicator only has one of the lights missing. Initial battery life is great. Lets hope it stays that way!
customer_reviews.author: MikeG

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great!  But default to party mode instead of stereo???
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these with the intentions to run them is stereo. Well I was very disappointed that the default mode to connect 2 or more is mono! In order to get them to connect in stereo you nave to use the Connect app which is not available for Windows. Besides the inconvenience with have to use the app, the application only works 50% of the time. and will intermittently switch back to mono when a video is changed in YouTube. If JBL would release a firmware update to change the default connect mode to be stereo! I will change my rating to 5 stars! Build, sound and battery life are all excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Joe V

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Bass, Short Battery Life, Bad App.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is pretty good. Looks good, it can be loud, and its easy to use. There are a few problems though that are significant. 1. The bass is hard to hear unless you're playing bass heavy songs. It needs to be like 50% louder. 2. The advertised battery life is 12 hours, it's about half of that. 3. JBL made an app called JBL connect. The app is terrible, it only works if you allow it access to your location. It is really buggy, its tutorials are extremely vague, and i couldn't get 2 speakers to play simultaneouly after about 20 minutes of trying.
customer_reviews.author: Nakaana Kato

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy more than one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Flip4 from Walmart. It has good sound for a small speaker. I bought my second one off Amazon. It sounds as good as the first. The problem (and reason why I'm returning this one) is that there really is no real stereo when you use two, so having two is pointless. It says it's in stereo mode but there is no difference from one speaker to the other. And when in "stereo more" the two speakers play out of sync. Very disappointing for an $80 speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: First 'played' with one of these speakers when my girlfriend's son visited. . . . then left his Flip 4 speaker at our house! I started playing around with it: paired it to my I-phone. . . . and Whoa!! I was blown away by the amazing fidelity, and presence of the sounds! Extremely solid construction, and water proof as well! I perform live music with students, and plan on using this great speaker to share pre-recorded songs, and background music for movement activities. JBL has always been one of the top audio manufacturers, and has again hit a 'home run' with this new device!
customer_reviews.author: yawnny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support AAC or APTX codecs. Bluetooth quality is poor, but speakers themselves are good.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker and overall build quality are very good, however, it's really a shame they don't support higher quality streaming that's been out for awhile. At their price point, they really should. Additionally, the sound quality seems to get worse when pairing more than one speaker. The silly noise they make when turning them on and off was really annoying, but there was an update that allows you to turn it off now. JBL, are you able to implement APTX via a firmware update? That would instantly put these speakers at the top of the pack!! Otherwise they aren't worth more than 3 stars, and that's being generous.
customer_reviews.author: MoreBikes

customer_reviews.title: Loses power instantly.
customer_reviews.text: They really missed the mark on this one. If you want a paper weight or a mantle piece this is the product! I will admit if it can hold a charge it sounds good. But when the battery can’t last more than an hour or so at higher volume you’d never know. Seriously, even when the speaker is plugged into an outlet it doesn’t keep the power on. Still a fan of JBL but this one is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cavallaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older Bose Mini II and enjoy the sound of it, however we wanted a 'cheaper' speaker that could set near the pool or lakeside or on a picnic table at the campground and not worry about being damaged by moisture. Our speaker has never been submerged or directly splashed with water, but it has been exposed to high humidity, fog, and dew, when left out overnight and it works great and has better than expected sound. I am truly impressed with the sound for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: S & L

customer_reviews.title: Expires in about a year
customer_reviews.text: I don’t beat up my speakers or anything. Right at about a year, the battery started screwing up. Would say fully charged in 5 minutes. Then die. Then it started turning off and on throughout the whole day. JBL offers no way for me to get it fixed. For a $100 speaker, I expect more than that. And their battery is awful. I like their products but they just don’t last. Pretty disappointed with JBL.
customer_reviews.author: linlo

customer_reviews.title: it won't last
customer_reviews.text: i bought it in december of 2017, and now, suddenly, it stoped working. I really mean suddenly. It was a really good product, with an amazing sound. I really enjoyed it, but from a day to the other, its battery is not holding up any charge. I charge it to 100%, and it won't last more than 3min. Really upset, since its from one of the best sound brands available. Worst of all is that this problem started to appear from one day to the other. Witch indicates its a fabrication problem.
customer_reviews.author: pedro vieira

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers to use in my clinic treatment rooms. I liked that they could pair together with bluetooth and play the same music from one device. However, the noise is constantly cutting in and out and creating static and everyone always asks if I'm playing a scratched CD. I spent so much money on these I have been hesitant to replace them, but I will have to. The speaker connections to one another is extremely faulty and I wish I never would have purchased these. As a stand alone speaker they are mostly okay but for JBL I expected a LOT more. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Hanus

customer_reviews.title: I work in a Diesel Shop
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Excellent frequency range and clarity. I work in a diesel shop and I can hear it really good and for me with the speaker at 60%ish volume on a full charge it lasted 7.5 hours which I'm fine with. Really impressed with the battery life to sound quality ratio. Down side is that I never heard a low battery warning. But then again, I work in a noisy shop. I've had it for a week and am very happy with the purchase. It's also cool to watch the subwoofers on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Such a great idea
customer_reviews.text: This is what I’ve been looking for. I didn’t know it existed till I saw one at the pool this summer. You have an app on your phone for music but the sound quality is crap. Connect via Bluetooth and this thing has booming sound. Good bass. You can control the volume from your phone or from the speaker. If you have more than one you can connect them and have speakers scattered throughout your house. The only complaint is the battery life. It is reasonably good. But not great. It probably would last the life of a party. Several hours. Maybe I’m expecting too much.
customer_reviews.author: lm thomson

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I chose this speaker because I've had excellent experiences with JBL and wanted high quality. After receiving I had trouble getting my iPhone and laptop to recognize it. I contacted this seller thru Amazon to explain my problem and ask for help. The owner of the store contacted me immediately and patiently walked me thru the process. Later his technician called to follow up. Customer Service is what it's all about. They went above and beyond what I normally expect from a seller. The speaker is exactly what I expected and this seller was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie1

customer_reviews.title: Was my flip 4 pre used ???
customer_reviews.text: The box had been opened. Did I get that 1/1000 lemon? Pro: The sound when I'm using my tablet. Con: When I turn up the volume above mid level... it crackles. Pro: I can charge it with my phone cord. Con: It didn't come with a charge cord. I've only had it for a couple days now, so I'll update when I use it more and challenge the battery and other complaints. For now, it crackles and no charge cable. The friend that recommend this item was stunned, his 3 is awesome! Anyone else have these issues??
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but there is better
customer_reviews.text: Sounds ok, but my Boss SoundLink Mini II sounds much better. I do like that the Flip 4 is weather resistant, and it's more mobile-friendly than the Bose. It's great for taking to the pool. The battery charge lasts longer, too. Wish it came with an adapter with the USB cable. Overall, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Keto Roberto

customer_reviews.title: This is a kick-but little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. Its got great volume - and the battery lasts hours and hours. I charge mine once or twice a week, and I use it hours daily. Sound quality is great - the Bluetooth connection is solid once you get it set up, but it was hard to get my phone to connect the first time. Though that may totally be a DEU problem lol.
customer_reviews.author: Violetness

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS - died after less than two years.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker until it wasn't. Worked great for almost two years. Then one day it wouldn't turn off. Just would not turn off when pressing the power button. Googled and found a factory reset trick. Didn't work. Had to disconnect from Bluetooth on my phone. Battery eventually died. Plugged it in to recharge and it lit up like it was recharging, but now will not turn on. Very disappointed. Called JBL and they said it's out of warranty and can't do anything. No suggestions. So frustrating that everything is "disposable" now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Life Ruiners
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have not been working right since I purchased them a year ago. After playing for about ten minutes the Bluetooth connection becomes unbearable and skips and has fuzz. I thought it was my phone’s fault this whole time but after using my brand new phone with these speakers they had the same problem :( I am ready to throw them in the garbage it’s so frustrating having skipping music I turn it off after ten minutes every time. I cannot listen to music like this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will not power on
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my iphone to the 11. I had to reset the device because it would not brodcast the bluetooth signal. While doing this the Flip powered down. It looked like it reset. However, Now it will only light up when I plug it in. The battery is new and the device is not that old. When researching the issue it is a known issue. The board that controls the buttons has gone bad. Now it is a just a paper weight. I will never buy JBL again. This is a known issue that they have not fixed. Update... contacted JBL and they replaced the item without any issue. I have changed the rating to 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Chad V.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: I must say that sound is rather disappointing. This speaker is way overpriced for the sound quality it delivers. If you’re looking for a small, portable speaker to take for a trip, or to the beach, it’s okay, though even than it could be smaller. If you not that concerned with portability and looking for a great sound for a deck or backyard or even inside, this is NOT the speaker to buy. Try Harman Kardon Onyx Studio instead that you can get for about $100.
customer_reviews.author: GML

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but battery is a known issue.
customer_reviews.text: First of all the JBL Flip 4 sounds great, no doubts. Unfortunately the unit has a bad battery that dies shortly after a couple of months. First you will start noticing the battery last less than usual, then it takes longer to 'fully charge'. Mine started this way, now it's useless, it can take several hours to supposedly show fully charged and it may work for 15min before dying. Warranty? I've never heard anybody was granted a replacement. You need to get an aftermarket battery and replace it by yourself. Is it worth it? Yes it is, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Emilesp

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just took this to Mexico so I could play my music. Quality of sound is very good. It is light enough to easily pack and it made my cocktail parties a big success. Very easy to connect and price is so reasonable. I looked at lots of options but didn’t want to spend more than $100 and after reviewing the reviews I decided to take a chance and I am really happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues early on.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this speaker for a month and already I’m having battery issues. It dies really fast when playing, and will shut itself off despite being plugged in. It will not charge and play at the same time. Now it suddenly doesn’t want to charge at all. Plugged in for an hour and only blinking light... not building up a charge. For the cost of this speaker I expect FAR better.
customer_reviews.author: DN904

customer_reviews.title: Still The Best 👍
customer_reviews.text: One of the best speakers you can buy. FW update gives you a little more bass. The size the sound the speakerphone everything is great on this speaker. This is my 5th Flip 4. Rather have this than a Flip 5. Looks great in white. Still the champ in this size and category. Crisp clear and a deep rich bass for this size.
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, waterproof, no skip buttons.
customer_reviews.text: I use it by the shower since it is waterproof. It works very nicely and sounds pretty good for such a small speaker. I feel like the battery life isn’t as long as it’s supposed to be, but that’s not such a big deal to me. I do wish it had buttons on it that would allow skipping to the next song, so that I don’t have to touch my phone when wet (although it’s waterproof too, I try not to). It only has volume buttons, play/stop, and a Bluetooth button.
customer_reviews.author: Brett B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for great sound quality, long battery life and the ability to connect two speakers for great sound in a large area (or just use one), without spending $100's of dollars- your search is over. My son got one of these a few months ago and I liked his so much that I bought my own. He uses both of them at times. Sound quality ✔️ Battery life✔️ Price point ✔️ All of this and it's waterproof too!! We will definitely be using these by the pool, at the lake on the boat and take them in the jet skis for when we stop to swim. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Died at 13 months, but Amazon warranty = 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness we purchased this speaker on Amazon because it died at barely 13 months and JBL was not going to replace it. Luckily we read our Amazon page and discovered that we had a 2 year warranty through our Amazon purchase. JBL was not going to replace the speaker until we brought our Amazon warranty to their attention. Otherwise, sound quality is very nice, with a slight lag, easy to sync. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but there are better options for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Likes: It's well-built and durable. I've used it it hanging from the showerhead and it seems pretty waterproof, but I haven't submerged it. Battery life is solid. Dislikes: It sounds fine until you hit about half volume - after that it gets muddier the louder it goes. Seems like JBL was happy to sacrifice sound quality to advertise higher dB levels. I purchased this to replace a much cheaper Oontz speaker that went bad after three years of abuse - wish that I had stuck with that brand instead of paying more for this.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's a JBL speaker - it's freaken good! What more can I say. Update: so I put it in my oven so that it maximizes the bass, kinda like the same thing as when you put your smartphone in a cup or bowl to increase the bass and loudness... Well anyway I forgot it in the oven and turned my oven to 400... 10 minutes later I go back to open my oven cuz I wanted to leave it open at 400 for the heat .. and there was my JBL baking.. poor thing. But the magic is that it STILL WORKS PERFECTLY :) It didn't even melt at all!! It was hot af but it's just fine!!
customer_reviews.author: Kez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed a visibly used speaker was shipped out as NÉW!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker a short time ago and I am just getting a chance to write this review . I was very disappointed with the purchase . This speaker was a used speaker. The speaker was supposed to be new . The plastic was not on the speaker, the loop string was already on the speaker and the charger wire was visibly dirty and used, and the speaker was dirty as well. I have another JBL speaker the same type, that I purchased at Best Buy, this speaker did not link up to be able to play together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a year and the battery life is just as great as the first day I got it. So worth the money. I take this everywhere with me. Haven’t tested out the waterproof-ness of it because I’m just not brave enough. I’ve been through so many speakers and they all lose battery life so quickly no matter the price. Gets pretty loud I’ve used this by the pool and the beach on vacations and it’s been loud enough. If youre outside and have a lot of people around you might need to snag another one and link it though
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Superior sounds quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been happy with my gen 1 clip JBL speaker for about the last 7 years. I thought it was time to upgrade and I was looking around and saw the flip4. I pulled it out the box and instantly connected it to my iphone. The audio quality blew me away. With the 1 sub on each end and the units internal speakers, it really produced some great sounds from a unit that is not much bigger then your hand. I have to say I am excited to buy another one to create the surround sound feature. For under 100$ you really are paying for the best speaker technology has to offer. GReat buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL flip 4. They may have a battery life expectancy of 2-3 years. I am a mobile fitness trainer and use mine like crazy. After 2-3 years, I was only getting through 1-2 workouts before I needed to recharge the battery. Whereas I can usually go several days on one charge. This puts out great sound for an outdoor workout without being offensive to others at an area park not involved with the workout. And waterproof is a great added bonus for trips to the beach or if the rain sets in
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dilworth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product with great tech support to back it up.
customer_reviews.text: Never had any issues with any JBL product. This speaker has great sound quality for its size especially. Very portable, easy to use. Battery life is fantastic! Very durable— takes a great beating and takes falls. Had the same product before and lasts a long time. Also tech support to order new cords is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Tiny powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This unit has great sound for it's size. I'm very pleased with it. I use it when I teach my self-defense/martial arts classes and it fills up the room on just 50%. The bluetooth effortlessly connects and you're up and running in about a minute. Play, pause, skip, volume up, down, etc all work easily off your phone's music player. Your calls and videos you play on your phone have crisp audio, as well. I cannot attest to the waterproof claims, however, as I only use it indoors in a climate controlled environment.
customer_reviews.author: Sakurabart

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I was looking for a good speaker this summer and especially for the pool. Came across the JBL flip 4 and made the right choice to buy it. Not only is it water proof but it has a great sound quality and battery life. I tested it on the pool submerging it and work perfectly fine after. I usually go a week without charging it and just charge on weekends when i need for the pool. I have to mention that i also bought the Wonderboom along with this speaker and it stopped working after it went in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Works great - Especially as a speaker phone
customer_reviews.text: Quality little bluetooth speaker. Sounds good, especially when i'm watching movies on my ipad or laptop when I'm on the road. I don't know if the sound is any better than other similar speakers, but the selling point for me was the integrated speakerphone/microphone for the speaker. It really improves the sound on conference calls using my cell phone. There have been times multiple people were gathered around my iphone, but this works great and sounds way better. I originally purchased the flip5, but exchanged it for this one because of the speaker phone option.
customer_reviews.author: Seebs

customer_reviews.title: Cuts in and out
customer_reviews.text: Not just when the microwave is on, but just does not play for a second or two every once in a while. If you shut it off and restart it, it works again. Pain to turn on both speakers and get them playing at the same time every time you want to enjoy. App is pointless. BUT I love JBL and they sound great! But honestly not as clear or loud as my speaker from 12 years ago when I fell in love with JBL, but hey, they are waterproof...

customer_reviews.title: Great but Horrible Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker to take to the beach, pool, or anywhere outdoors. The sound quality is great and the volume gets pretty loud, but the battery life is horrible. It takes maybe 2-3 hours to fully charge and will be completely dead after about 4 hours. I have to charge this hours before I plan to use it and sometimes it dies within the first two hours. I really wish the battery lasted more than one use, it's super annoying trying to entertain with this speaker because it will likely die in the middle of it. Luckily I have a larger speaker that plugs into the wall, but I still use this for shorter duration outside.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOUD! Perfect for college!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has the JBL Xtreme 2 so I already knew and loved the brand. However, that one is way too big for me to have in a college dorm. That’s why I went with this smaller one and I swear it basically carries the same strength! It gets super loud and has this surround sound effect to it. The music sounds so complete with this speaker and it’s the perfect portable size. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Branda

customer_reviews.title: Best portable speaker I have owned and I have owned several.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker came quickly and I have been more amazed everytime I use it at the quality of the sound given the size and price. It is by far my favorite portable now. The battery life is excellent. A side plus is the all the extra stuff that you can buy ie. cases and carrying straps and other stuff. I am tempted to buy another one given the current prices and color selection. Can't say enough good about JBL Flip 4.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Advertised Battery life Is a lie
customer_reviews.text: A speaker is only as good as its battery life. This one is pathetically short especially when playing at loud volume (using it outdoor it HAS to be loud). Called when I noticed issues with it and customer service refused to replace it. There’s plenty other good options out there so I would suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Oontz Angle...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th small blutooth speaker I've owned and by far the best. It blows the Oontz angle out of the water in terms of volume and bass. This speaker works best in a smaller space without too much distance between it and the listener. For it's size the bass is really great. That said if you take it outside or into a large room it tends to feel a little tinny at high volumes, but for it's size I think it's the best in this category aside from maybe a bose. Very happy. Definitely above average blutetooth speaker. Fine for bedroom listening. Bass is good. Terrible a tad tinny.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This JBL bluetooth speaker has really great sound for it's size. I tried lying it down and standing it up and think the bass is a bit better standing up. Also, the bluetooth connection range seems to be pretty good as I can move with my phone into another room in my house away from the speaker without any disruption to the sound. And I would add that for the price it was a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: John, Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but average overall beyond looks.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad speaker... While it looks nice and is water proof/resistant... It's a bit overpriced for what you get. You pay for that JBL name brand, really. There are better, slightly larger speakers on the market with far more bass, that are also waterproof... for a lot less money. Because they're small, they fit well inside of a small camper or tent situation. They do get loud, as well. Battery life is nothing to be amazed by, it's average.
customer_reviews.author: Jowly

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this after having a isound glow tower. The isound was very good for the $50 price, I wanted something louder and with longer battery life. The flip 4 is great, has good bass sound and lasts for hours! I have used it for 4 hrs straight on 3/4 volume and its still playing on lower volume in the house a hr or 2 a day 3 days later! I love that it will pair with another flip4, saving up for another one! Great speaker for just under $100.
customer_reviews.author: alicia1

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH CHARGER CORD 🤨
customer_reviews.text: Only had this product two days but it’s quite powerful. It’s a great product BUTTTTT it came without a charging cord. Odd to receive a costly speaker without a charger cord. Not sure of battery longevity. UPDATE: have product now for a good week. Again... no charger card came with product. Thought I could get over that BUT the dern thing will not stay on. Keeps shutting off. Returning this 💩 Monday morning!
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia walker

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product in June 2018, it's now January 2019. And the battery can no longer hold its charge longer than 20 minutes. At first it would last for at least 12 hours but now I had to be plugged in to last that long. Also the plug has to be in the exact right spot for it to charge, if you bump it or jostle it in anyway, it stops charging. VERY frustrating. The Good: It is waterproof, (used it in the pool a few times). The sound quality is pretty good and the ability to use it to do conference calls (because it has a mic in it) is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Dabovich

customer_reviews.title: Not bad... Battery life isn’t as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I got the teal one for my birthday. I love the color, the sound, my phone connects to it with no problem. But I dropped 2 stars b/c the 12hrs of continuous play is a joke. Mine won’t even get 5hrs continuous play. So far it hasn’t been a problem bc I’m @ home enjoying it but if I ever take it somewhere not even getting half what’s promised might suck. Better take a battery pk with you or charging cable. Not going to last 12hrs. Still a good speaker but if it dying after less than half that times a problem you might look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has Almoststopped working completely
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what happened but I bought these last May and they're about to completely stop working. The sound is not coming out clearly anymore; everytime there's even a small base in the song, the speakers sound like it's banging against a wall. Everytime I skip a song or even choose a song, it skips/scratches part of the song. I can't even remember the last time I've dropped it or the last time it's been around water; and even so they said it was waterproof. Only positive thing about this is that the battery life they advertise is pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: khalil

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different no-name brand Bluetooth speaker. It was so bad I didn’t want to use it. The flip4 sounds really good. I prefer it to my Bose Soundlink. The battery surprised me with how long it lasts. I played 4 hours of moderate volume tunes and when I plugged it in to charge, only 1 led was flashing(I think 80% charged). Easy to connect to both my iPhone and laptop. Good range too. I was outside in the woods about 50 paces away and it didn’t loose connection. I like this speaker a lot.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, clear, durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bluetooth speaker I've owned--and I've gone through many. I'm not an audiophile by any means, but I listen to a lot of different kinds of media on this. Great for a variety of music (even bass which small speakers like this don't tend to do well with), podcasts, and movies on my computer. It's clear, never crackly, and I've never come close to maxing out the volume. Small enough to throw in a bag, and the battery life is so good that I sometimes forget to charge it for upwards of a week.
customer_reviews.author: akd32

customer_reviews.title: JBL knocked it out of the park with this one!
customer_reviews.text: I would have never thought such good quality sound can be produced by such a small speaker. This thing really is great. And the fact that you can pair several of them together (they say up to 100 but to be honest that overkill) is great. I've got a second one on the way! Quick Update: I now have three of these. Pairing them together couldn't be simpler. They hold a charge for a long time too. Also hooked one up to an old radio using a 3.5mm cable. Puts the radios speakers to shame. Can't say enough positive things about these Flip4's!
customer_reviews.author: DmanDan

customer_reviews.title: Not a long product life
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this for about 2 years and now it has stopped working. I'm totally bummed. I've gone back and forth with JBL and unfortunately I think I'm going to have to eat it. I would have expected to get a little more life out of this for the cost. I take care of my things and nothing specifically happened to cause the speaker to malfunction. Great speaker, just doesn't have a long life as stated.
customer_reviews.author: T. O'Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Sound is pretty good and pretty loud
customer_reviews.text: I'm really excited about this! It sounds really good, although I almost think my 90's computer speakers might still sound better. This is totally worth it for the bluetooth though. I'm interested in seeing what the larger model sounds like. I still can't decide if I like the sea-foam green color. One thing I wasn't expecting was that it doesn't put out sound in 360 degrees. It's definitely loudest in the direction of the logo. I definitely think the money was worth it though!! I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: MVDVM268

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound at a attractive price
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is quite impressive for the price. It will deliver a crisp sound at about 3/4 volume and has a little distortion at max volume. The size, quality, construction are all spot on. Only complaint is that it cuts out over Bluetooth on occasion. I only knocked off one star because we've only had it occur a few times but it's annoying when it does. Rebooted phones, etc. and the issue did not go away. (This is NOT an issue every time we use it, only a few times)
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Charge 4 and Flip 4 work together to make a great bluetooth set for the whole apartment
customer_reviews.text: We have the JBL Flip 4 and the Charge 4 that are able to sync together and provide coverage over the whole apartment, so that we can listen to the same thing in the kitchen, in the study, in the living room, in the bathroom or on the deck. Syncing is easy and intuitive, volume control on the secondary speakers is controlled individually, and you can "pause" them without interrupting anyone else's listening. Or, we can individually Bluetooth to a speaker, and listen to different things. Or, we use the speakers to amplify laptop sounds. These are perfect, simple to use, and easy to understand. We are so happy with them!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: All of the reviews that you read of this speaker that say it is great are true. It's nice and compact, water-safe which is just a nice added bonus because I would have bought it even if it weren't, very reliable connects via bluetooth (or you can use a cord if your device is not bluetooth enabled), and it simply puts out a nice, solid, well-rounded sound. LOTS of volume if that's what you want, but it can also play softly if that's what you want. My teen-age son commandeered the first one I bought so I just ordered another for myself. Buy this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Solneeshka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I read a million reviews about portable speakers and it taught me one thing, even the "legit" websites reviewing products are just looking for the click-through income. These JBL portable speakers get all sorts of glowing reviews but it honestly sounds just ok. It works, sounds ok, and is not too expensive, so its ok. I don't regret the purchase. Any review that says that this thing is blasting out crystal clear sound though is just looking to get a few cents from the recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: And i'm so glad i chose this over the new BOSE speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a JBL Flip speaker since June of last year, but couldn't bring myself to spend $120 on something for just me. But once i saw that the price lowered to $80, i couldn't pass it up!! And i'm so glad i chose this over the new BOSE speaker. I have an older BOSE speaker that was purchased in 2013, and this is just as good if not better. Especially considering it's water proof, and smaller in size than my BOSE. I've already recommended this to my friends as well as family members! Can't wait to purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: SarcherTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this product from any other seller or website. I made that mistake the first time and spent too much on a shoddy knockoff. This one is the real deal and the difference in audio quality and build is obvious. I bring this to work with me on delivery days and my coworkers adore having this speaker around. I like my music loud and it's the perfect combination of volume and portability. The battery tends to run down quickly, like in a couple hours when it's on full volume, but turning it down a bit can conserve the battery life, or I just bring a charger with me. Worth every penny for the joy of music.
customer_reviews.author: Dae H

product_meta.title: JBL FLIP 4 - Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

JBL Flip 4 is the next generation in the award-winning Flip series; it is a portable Bluetooth speaker that delivers surprisingly powerful stereo sound. This compact speaker is powered by a 3000mAh rechargeable Li-ion battery that offers 12 hours of continuous, high-quality audio playtime. Sporting durable, waterproof fabric materials that are available in 6 vibrant colors, Flip 4 is the all purpose, all weather companion that takes the party everywhere. It also features a built-in noise and echo cancelling speakerphone for crystal clear conference calls, and JBL Connect+ technology that can wirelessly links more than 100 JBL Connect+ enabled speakers together to amplify the listening experience. With a simple button press, you can activate and talk to Siri or Google Now from your JBL Flip 4. Charging time (hrs)3.5 and Output power (W)2 x 8. 

BOX CONTAINS
1 x JBL Flip 4; 1 x Micro-USB Ladekabel; 1 x Quick Start Guide 1 x Safety Sheet; Warranty Card
feature_bullets: Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns playing impressive stereo sound
Built-in 3000mAh rechargeable li-ion battery Supports up to 12 hours of playtime
Ipx7 waterproof means no more worrying about rain or spills; you can even submerge flip 4 in water
JBL connect+ allows you to Link more than 100 JBL connect+ enabled speakers together to amplify the party
Dual external passive radiators demonstrate just how powerful your speaker is
